name: Baby Monty
overview: Baby Monty, Monty Mole's little brother. You are taking part in a new adventure with Baby Mole. Baby Mole has fallen from his shelf into a mega-dark cavern. His only means of escape is to jump into an old rowing boat. By staying afloat on the vessel he can guide himself through the caves above. But beware of the tumbling barrels which have escaped from an old arcade game left on the side to rot. Personal Computer Games 1984/08 / PCW Games Collection for the Commodore 64.
